Package com.github.skopylov58.functional

package com.github.skopylov58.functional
This package provides interfaces for functional exception handling Try<T>, Either<R, L>, Validation<T, E> and some useful high order functions.
  • Class
    Description
    Decorator<T,R>
     
    Either<L,R>
    Minimal functional Either implementation.
    Either.Left<L,R>
    Left side of Either.
    Either.Right<L,R>
    Right side of Either.
    FPUtils
    Collection of useful higher-order functions to handle exceptions in functional style.
    FPUtils.Backoff
     
    FPUtils.CheckedFunction<T,R>
    Function that may throw an exception.
    FPUtils.CheckedSupplier<T>
    Supplier that may throw an exception.
    FPUtils.Result<T>
    Try Result for Java 14+
    FPUtils.ResultJava8<T>
